alert.note: Alert for North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sioux and southeastern Niobrara Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Montrose, or 23 miles south of Edgemont, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
